name: RGB Ghostscape
description:
Our entry for 2022s 7dfps game jam.

A game about buildin' decks, shootin' ghosts, and runnin' for your life!

A game made by:

  • Cai
  • Tissue Inu

Controls:

  • [WASD] - Move
  • [LMB] - Shoot
  • [Space] - Jump
  • [E] - View cards

Warning: The game may behave oddly in web format (lagging/loss of control). For a better experience play the Windows .exe version.
